Organum vetus & novum, or, A discourse of reason and truth wherein the natural logick common to mankinde is briefly and plainly described / by Richard Burthogge ... in a letter to the most Honourable Andrew Trevill, Esq. ... Burthogge, Richard, 1638?-ca. 1700.
[3], 73 [i.e. 75] p.
Printed for Sam. Crouch ..., London : 1678.
Running title: A discourse of truth and reason. Advertisements: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
